Global%20Variables.html#/s:5Auth012defau.name: defaultScope
Global%20Variables.html#/s:5Auth012defau.abstract: Default scope value used across Auth0.swift. Equals to openid profile email.

Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.name: emailVerified(_:connection:)
Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: Set the verified status of the email.

Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.name: phoneNumber(_:verified:verify:connection:clientId:)
Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: Change the phone number of the user (SMS connection only).

Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.name: phoneVerified(_:connection:)
Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: Set the verified status of the phone number.

Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.name: accessToken
Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.abstract: Token used that allows calling to the requested APIs (the audience value` sent on authentication).

Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.name: refreshToken
Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.abstract: If the API allows you to request new access tokens and the scope offline_access was included on authentication.

Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.name: idToken
Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.abstract: Token that details the user identity after authentication.

Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.name: scope
Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.abstract: Granted scopes, only populated when a requested scope or scopes was not granted.

Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.name: recoveryCode
Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.abstract: MFA recovery code that the application must display to the end-user to be stored securely for future use.

Classes/Credentials.html#/c:@M@Auth0@obj.name: description
Classes/Credentials.html#/c:@M@Auth0@obj.abstract: Custom description that redacts the tokens with <REDACTED>.

Classes/Credentials.html#/c:@CM@Auth0@ob.name: supportsSecureCoding
Classes/Credentials.html#/c:@CM@Auth0@ob.abstract: Property that enables secure coding. Equals to true.

Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html.name: UserPatchAttributes
Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html.abstract: Attributes of the user allowed to update using patch() method of `Users.
